data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 300 citizens of the the state of Melekeok.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Melekeok, Palau
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Melekeok, Palau to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Please, convict the 66 believers in Melekeok, Palau to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 221 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Melekeok Village
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Melekeok Village, Melekeok, Palau.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Melekeok to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Melekeok.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.section_summary:
the state of Melekeok, Palau has a population of 300.

We estimate Melekeok has 66 people who might know Jesus, 221 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 13 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Melekeok.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.
